sqlGroup.name: meeting
sqlGroup.sql: select DISTINCT mm.MeetingID,mm.MeetingDate,mm.MeetingTime,mm.MeetingContent,mm.MeetingLocation,IFNULL(mui.MarkImportantTime,'') MarkImportantTime from meeting_master mm left join meeting_userindex mui on mui.MeetingID = mm.MeetingID where mui.UserID=? and (mm.MeetingDate >= ? and mm.MeetingDate <= ?)
